str2: Today, now. Neuter of a presumed compound of the article ho and hemera; on the day; generally, now.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
A city, the inhabitants of a city. Probably from the same as polemos, or perhaps from polus; a town.
David, King of Israel. Of Hebrew origin; Dabid, the Israelite king.
A savior, deliverer, preserver. From sozo; a deliverer, i.e. God or Christ.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A strengthened form of a primary teko tek'-o; to produce, literally or figuratively.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Anointed One; the Messiah, the Christ. From chrio; Anointed One, i.e. The Messiah, an epithet of Jesus.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.
